gobblin.runtime.job_monitor

Class KafkaAvroJobMonitor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.kafka.HighLevelConsumer<byte[],byte[]>
        • gobblin.runtime.job_monitor.KafkaJobMonitor
          • gobblin.runtime.job_monitor.KafkaAvroJobMonitor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the subclass of SpecificRecord that messages implement.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, JobSpecMonitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvroJobSpecKafkaJobMonitor, SLAEventKafkaJobMonitor

    public abstract class KafkaAvroJobMonitor<T>
extends KafkaJobMonitor
    A job monitor for Avro messages. Uses a fixed input schema to parse the messages, then calls #parseJobSpec(T) for each one.
